sycamore knoll underwater alien base.lore_1: Sycamore Knoll, an underwater structure off California, has been speculated to be an alien base by some.
sycamore knoll underwater alien base.lore_2: Many UFOologists have suggested that the source of UFOs is not extraterrestrial, but rather a secret underwater base.
sycamore knoll underwater alien base.lore_3: This would imply that they have been here longer than we have, at that point who would the real aliens be?

reactionless drive.lore_1: The reactionless drive is a hypothetical propulsion system that would allow a spacecraft to accelerate without expelling propellant.
reactionless drive.lore_2: Some conspiracy theorists believe that this technology is being developed by a secretive group of scientists and engineers.
reactionless drive.lore_3: The true medium by which this propulsion is achieved is through the creation and utilization of gravitic waves.

panopticon.lore_1: The Panopticon is a design where a single watchman can observe all inmates without them knowing when they're watched.
panopticon.lore_2: The only a theory, it suggests a possible relationship between citizens and the state.
panopticon.lore_3: A few annaccountable people could dominate the rest of the world, each individual would think they are being watched, even if they aren't

prana release.description: Unlocking life energy or just myth?
prana release.lore_1: Prana release, from yogic traditions, involves freeing vital energy for health or spiritual purposes.
prana release.lore_2: The body has hidden pathways that can be unlocked to release this energy.
prana release.lore_3: The ancients new the body better than most modern biohackers ever will

interdimensional bigfoot.lore_1: Bigfoot, also known as Sasquatch, is a legendary creature that is said to inhabit the forests of North America.
interdimensional bigfoot.lore_2: Some Bigfoot theories propose these creatures can move between dimensions or have origins beyond our world.
interdimensional bigfoot.lore_3: But if bigfoot only spends a portion of their time in our dimension, then where is the rest of their time spent?

ghost condensate.lore_1: If the spiritual realm exists, then what is it made of?
ghost condensate.lore_2: What would the properties of this material be?
ghost condensate.lore_3: And if one could manipulate this material, then what could it be used to create?

breatharianism.lore_1: Breatharianism claims individuals can live without food or water, subsisting on prana or light energy.
breatharianism.lore_2: The human body is capable of absorbing light energy, and converting it into the necessary nutrients for survival.
breatharianism.lore_3: The ancients knew this, and used it to their advantage, by slowing down their metabolism to live longer

psychotropic warfare.lore_1: Psychotropic warfare involves using psychoactive substances to alter the behavior or perceptions of enemies.
psychotropic warfare.lore_2: However when the elites of a nation begin to view the population as enemies, weapons previously reserved for other populations is subtely deployed at home.
psychotropic warfare.lore_3: Indeed the MK ULTRA program itself utilized LSD in ther pursuit of breaking and remolding the mind.

All of human history is fake.base: All of human history is fake
All of human history is fake.description: Is everything we know a lie?
All of human history is fake.lore_1: This theory suggests that all historical accounts are fabrications, part of a grand deception by unknown powers.
All of human history is fake.lore_2: It challenges archaeology, written history, and cultural memory, proposing we live in an orchestrated illusion.
All of human history is fake.lore_3: History is a story told to us by the victors, and the victors are the ones who write the history books

object oriented ontology.lore_1: Object-Oriented Ontology (OOO) posits that all objects, not just humans, have their own reality and agency.
object oriented ontology.lore_2: This theory challenges traditional philosophical views on the nature of reality and existence.
object oriented ontology.lore_3: It suggests that every object, from a rock to a thought, has its own unique reality and can act independently.

accelerationism.description: Speeding towards the future or doom?
accelerationism.lore_1: Accelerationism advocates accelerating capitalist or technological processes to bring about radical change or collapse.
accelerationism.lore_2: It suggests that the current system is unsustainable and must be disrupted to create a new, more equitable order.
accelerationism.lore_3: Rather than languishing in the present, it would be better to speed things up, if only to see what happens

quantum entanglement.lore_1: Quantum entanglement is a phenomenon where two particles become linked, affecting each other instantaneously.
quantum entanglement.lore_2: This theory suggests that the universe is fundamentally interconnected, with every action potentially affecting distant points.
quantum entanglement.lore_3: It challenges the idea of causality, proposing that events can be influenced by distant events, or even the future

kundalini energy.description: Awaken the serpent or unleash chaos?
kundalini energy.lore_1: Kundalini energy is a concept in yoga and tantra, representing a coiled serpent energy at the base of the spine.
kundalini energy.lore_2: If the energy at the base of the spine is able to rise through the chakras, it can eventually reach the brain.
kundalini energy.lore_3: Once the energy reaches the brain, it can continue further beyond, connecting to the cosmos itself.

brain in a jar.ability: Encases your mind in a jar, creating an explosion of glass shards, damaging enemies in a radius for %s psychic damage on enemy contact.
brain in a jar.lore_1: The brain in a jar scenario is a thought experiment that explores the idea of how sensation constructs one's perception of reality.
brain in a jar.lore_2: If a brain was floating in a jar somewhere, recieving electrical impulses that simulated an exernal world, the brain would not be able to tell the difference.
brain in a jar.lore_3: When this theory is pondered on a deeper level, it raises the question, what is the ultimate basis of reality? And can we ever know it?

symbiogenesis.description: Life from symbiosis or hidden evolution?
symbiogenesis.lore_1: Symbiogenesis is the theory that new species arise from symbiotic relationships between different organisms.
symbiogenesis.lore_2: This theory challenges the traditional view of evolution, which suggests that species change over time through natural selection.
symbiogenesis.lore_3: Symbiogensis instead suggests that life is a single organism living in concert with itself and the world.

anatta.ability: Grants %s chance for enemy damage to miss.
anatta.description: No self or control over identity?
anatta.lore_1: Anatta or no-self in Buddhism denies the existence of a permanent, unchanging soul or self.
anatta.lore_2: Instead, it suggests that the self is an illusion created by the mind.
anatta.lore_3: If our self of self is an illusion, then controlling that illusion could grant the highest form of self-control.

polywater.lore_1: Polywater is a hypothetical form of water that has a higher density than normal water.
polywater.lore_2: It's believed to have a number of unusual properties, such as being able to dissolve more substances than normal water.
polywater.lore_3: Water is a conduit of life, but to realize that it has a life of its own grants the keys to life itself.

human genome projects true purpose.ability: Increases insight gain of enemies killed by towers buffed byANCESTRAL_MEMORIES by +%s
human genome projects true purpose.lore_1: The Human Genome Project was a massive effort to map the human genome, but what was the true purpose?
human genome projects true purpose.lore_2: Some believe that the project was a way to control the population, isolating and weaponizing the genes of the population against them.
human genome projects true purpose.lore_3: That which can be used to cure, can also be used to kill, by targeting certain genes, you can target certain people.
